title: Westward Fate
description: Edwina Bradbury, sole heiress of a vast fortune has finally agreed to come to Dawson after being enticed by an advertisement for a mail-order bride from a handsome English butler. He is charmed by Edwinaâ€™s wit and independence. They embark on a romance that blossoms even as shocking truths come to light. Will these events rob them of a wonderful future or will their new-found love endure all?
